description.value:
The marilith makes seven attacks: six with its longswords and one with its tail.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage 2d10 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, the marilith can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the marilith can't make tail attacks against other targets.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Resistance. The marilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Magic Weapons. The marilith's weapon attacks are magical.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Reactive. The marilith can take one reaction on every turn in a combat.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

The marilith adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the marilith must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
